item.title: Money is everything, but you haven't met Open Source Software maintainers
item.author: simumbaaaron20@gmail.com (Aaron Simumba)
item.description: For profit centred enterprises, it is not surprising when you encounter their overly aggressive marketing campaigns, which mostly have an end result of them trying to squeeze every penny from you as a customer. At the end of the day, you pay even for a service and product that is not satisfactory or worse, not worth you hard earned money. Conversely, for a few months now, I have been using many Open Source Software.
